Alright! I'll get back to it!
Yes, done, what's next?
Perfect! Then it's time to place the 4 Residences with the Build Tool, click build and provide your Builder with the necessary items like the last time and come back once all 4 are built!
Consider it done!
Not yet, I will get to it later!

Awesome! Now you should have some space to hire some visitors from the tavern (by right clicking and providing the items they require) or at least have space for your citizens to have some children. Here, have some wool, it will sure come in handy. Will contact you in a bit again!
See you in a bit!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.housing2.ob: Now that you got a level 2 builder the next logical step is upgrading your residences. Residences house 1 citizen per housing level up to five citizens at level five.
Sounds exciting! What do you want me to do?.
Upgrade two of your residences to level 2 and come back to me later then!
Excellent. I'll leave you be for now then. Make sure to check on your quest log regularly.
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
Excellent. I'll leave you be for now then. Make sure to check on your quest log regularly.

Amazing! This is the best way to attract new citizens to your colony! Not only that! Citizens are also considerably happier in higher residence tiers! Here I found these racks earlier. I'm sure they will come in handy!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.military.ba: The defences are starting to look good. But we're still lacking some offensive power in the case of a large scale invasion. We should get some barracks up and running!

Barracks come with up to 4 barrack towers (at level 4+) where each tower can house up to 5 guards (at level 5) giving you a whopping 20 guards! But before we do that, we need to first research it at the university!'
Alrighty then! You know the drill, craft the barracks hut block in a crafting bench. This time surround a block of iron with planks and the build tool at the top.
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
Oh nice, then we are done here and I will have more information on the next steps soon!

Now that the research is done, the process is the same. Craft and place the hut, then let the builder build it! You know the drill, craft the barracks hut block in a crafting bench. This time surround a block of iron with planks and the build tool at the top.
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
Great. If you want to start having guards you should also build and upgrade the barracks towers. I will leave this to you. Here, some equipment to get your guards going!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.military.gu: Building Defences
I'm still not feeling very safe. Some might argue that the strongest defense is a swift and decisive offense. How about you build some guard towers?
Alright, on it!
Nice, so as usual we start by crafting the Guard Tower block. In the crafting bench, surround a bow with planks and put the Build Tool in the top. Come back to me once you've done that!'
On it!
Già fatto!
Alrighty then! Then it's time to place both Guard Towers with the Build Tool, click build and provide your Builder with the necessary items like the last time and come back once they are built!
Consider it done!
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
Già fatto!
Oh nice, then we are done here and I will have more information on the next steps soon!
Nice!
Welcome back, were you able to craft the Guard Tower block?
No, I forgot the recipe!
A great leap forward often requires taking two steps back! In the crafting bench, surround a bow with planks and put the Build Tool in the top.
Alright! I'll get back to it!
Yes, done, what's next?
Alrighty then! Then it's time to place the Guard Towers with the Build Tool, click build and provide your Builder with the necessary items like the last time and come back once both are built!
Consider it done!
I already finished building the Guard Towers!
Oh nice, then we are already done here and I will have more information on the next steps soon!
Fantastico!
Not yet, I will get to it later!

Awesome, I feel much safer already. Guards actually live in their guard towers and don't need housing spots. So just make sure they have armor and weapons and they will serve you well. Come back in a bit and I'll help you with the next steps!
See you in a bit!
Expanding your Territory
I see your colony is coming together nicely. I believe it'd be a good idea to place and upgrade some guard towers to expand the colony borders and bolster your defences!
Sure, sounds good!
Excellent, then go craft some more guard tower blocks, place them and have your builder build and upgrade them. Let's target around 10 levels of guard towers. That's like 5 level 2 guard towers.'
On it!
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
Awesome, your village is expanding and ready to face intruders. Come back in a bit and I'll help you with the next steps! Here, have a set of armor to equip your guards with!
See you in a bit!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.military.to: Hello! I see your colony is growing. However, it is quite dangerous around here. How about you light the area up a little bit to avoid monsters preying on your citizens?
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
Great, thanks! This should definitely help a bit. Here, I found these, I'm sure they will come in handy!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.military.zo: Hi, there seem to be a lot of dangerous mobs around here! Would you mind killing some zombies to make us feel more at ease?
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
Great, thanks! I feel more at ease already. Here, have some leather armor!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.mine.obj0: Hello there! We should be producing enough food for now. Just make sure your colonist stay fed by leaving food in their inventories. The next step is then to get a Mine up and running!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.mine.obj0.a: So, as usual we start by crafting the Mine hut block. In the crafting bench, surround a wooden or stone pickaxe with planks and put the Build Tool in the top. Come back to me once you've done that!'
Alrighty then! Then it's time to place the Mine with the Build Tool, click build and provide your Builder with the necessary items like the last time and come back once it is built!
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
Oh nice, then we are done here and I will have more information on the next steps soon!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.mine.obj1: Welcome back, were you able to craft the Mine hut block?
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.mine.obj1.a: A great leap forward often requires taking two steps back! In the crafting bench, surround a wooden or stone pickaxe with planks and put the Build Tool in the top.
Alright! I'll get back to it!
Alrighty then! Then it's time to place the Mine with the Build Tool, click build and provide your Builder with the necessary items like the last time and come back once it is built!
I already finished building the Mine!
Oh nice, then we are already done here and I will have more information on the next steps soon!
Not yet, I will get to it later!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.mine.obj3: Neat, soon your miner will start bringing in all kinds of stones and ores, just make sure that you provide them the necessary tools and materials. The miner will first dig down and build a shaft structure for which they will require some material. Later they will also expand horizontally.
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.mine.obj3.a: Come back in a bit and I'll help you with the next steps! Here, have some ladders, the miner will need them soon!
While we are getting food from the farm, you still have to manually feed the citizens when they are hungry. How about we build a restaurant so that is taken care of automatically?
Sounds great!!

The cook in the restaurant will not only cook food for you in the furnace automatically, but they will also hand out food to citizens that are hungry. You know the drill, craft the restaurant hut block in a crafting bench. This time surround an apple with planks and the build tool at the top.'
On it!
Già fatto!
Alrighty then! Then it's time to place the Restaurant with the Build Tool, click build and provide your Builder with the necessary items like the last time and come back once it is built!
Consider it done!
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
Già fatto!
Oh nice, then we are done here and I will have more information on the next steps soon!
Nice!
Welcome back, were you able to craft the Restaurant hut block?
No, I forgot the recipe!
No problem! In the crafting bench, surround an apple with planks and put the Build Tool in the top.
Alright! I'll get back to it!
Yes, done, what's next?
Alrighty then! Then it's time to place the Restaurant with the Build Tool, click build and provide your Builder with the necessary items like the last time and come back once it is built!
Consider it done!
Not yet, I will get to it later!

Neat, soon your cook will hand out food to your citizens, just make sure the restaurant is supplied with food and there is a menu setup for what the cook will hand out. Keep in mind that vanilla foods are not as saturating for citizens as they are for players. Here, have some coal to serve as initial fuel!
See you in a bit!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.sawmill.obj: I see you working yourself to death crafting all these stairs and planks on your own. I think it's about time to get a sawmill to automate this task!

The sawmill is able to craft most wood related blocks on demand and your couriers will make sure that they get all they need for it! But before we do that, we need to first research it at the university!'

Alrighty then! You know the drill, craft the sawmill hut block in a crafting bench, place it and let your builder build it. This time put three wooden axes in the middle, put the build tool at the top and fill up the rest with planks.
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
Oh nice, then we are done here and I will have more information on the next steps soon!

Alrighty then! You know the drill, craft the sawmill hut block in a crafting bench, place it and let your builder build it. This time put three wooden axes in the middle, put the build tool at the top and fill up the rest with planks.
Not right now. I will come back to you later!

Great, the sawmill has a recipe page where you can teach all the recipes you want the sawmill to handle automatically. You can upgrade the hut to unlock more recipe slots, and research and build the other Crafters in a similar fashion.
This is going to be so useful!
I have taught you everything I know. and you have become a far greater Mayor than I could ever hope to be. Good luck on this journey!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.tavern.obj0: Hi there! Your builder is looking neat! How about we let them build a Tavern so that your citizens don't have to sleep outside and are safe at night?
Nice, so as usual we start by crafting the Tavern hut block. In the crafting bench, surround a Barrel with planks and put the Build Tool in the top. Come back to me once you've done that!'
Alrighty then! Then it's time to place the Tavern with the Build Tool, click build and provide your Builder with the necessary items like the last time and come back once it is built!
Oh nice, then we are done here and I will have more information on the next steps soon!
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.tavern.obj1: Welcome back, were you able to craft the tavern hut block?
A great leap forward often requires taking two steps back! Just surround a Barrel with planks in the crafting table and put the Build Tool in the top middle slot.
Alright! I'll get back to it!
Alrighty then! Then it's time to place the Tavern with the Build Tool, click build and provide your Builder with the necessary items like the last time and come back once it is built!
I already finished building the Tavern!
Oh nice, then we are already done here and I will have more information on the next steps soon!
Not yet, I will get to it later!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.tavern.obj3: Amazing, you are now providing housing for all your citizens. The Tavern provides four housing slots but you can have at most one Tavern per colony. Come back a bit later and I will let you know the next steps! Here, have some baked potatoes as a reward to help keep the citizens fed!
Hi, I've seen a fancy new residence was just recently completed. The people that live there start becoming a bit more picky with food.
Uhh, eehh, what does that mean?
First, aside from the restaurant you should build a Cookery that is able to cook some of the special dishes and provide them to the restaurant!
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
I know all about that already!
Excellent. I'll leave you be for now then. Make sure to check on your quest log regularly.

Great, now that the Cookery is finished, make sure that your farmer grows the crops for the recipes. You can obtain the seeds from breaking blocks like grass, fern, bushes, etc with a hoe! Here, have some Onion and Garlic to get started!
Forgive me for interrupting, Your Highness. I meant no disrespect. But now that we have a warehouse and a courier, I'm sure you would like to know how to automate crafting.
Unfortunately, at the moment your colony still lacks the know-how. But don't falter, this is the perfect moment to get a university to acquire all the necessary knowledge.
I will do what I must!

Excellent. Craft the University hut block by putting a book in the middle and bottom slot of the crafting grid, surround it with planks and put a build tool in the top. Then find a suitable location in the colony to place it and let your builder build it to level 1.
Excellent. I'll leave you be for now then. Make sure to check on your quest log regularly.
Excellent. I'll leave you be for now then. Make sure to check on your quest log regularly.
Not right now. I will come back to you later!

Amazing. The university is the gateway to a rich selection of technologies that allow you to expand, grow and automate your colony. Upgrading the building unlocks additional research possibilities and allows you to hire more researchers.
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.warehouse.o: Hi! I'm sure your feet are hurting by now because you are manually fulfilling all the citizens needs! I got good news! You can automate most of this with the help of a warehouse and courier!
Tell me more about it!

Let's start by crafting a warehouse block by surrounding a chest with planks and the build tool in the top slot and a courier hut by surrounding a set of chain boots with planks and the build tool in the top slot.
On it!
Already got a warehouse and courier!
Excellent. I'll leave you be for now then. Make sure to check on your quest log regularly.
Noted!
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
Already got one!!
Excellent. I'll leave you be for now then. Make sure to check on your quest log regularly.
Noted!
Welcome back, did you craft the warehouse and courier hut blocks already?
No, I forgot what I had to do!
Craft a warehouse block by surrounding a chest with planks and the build tool in the top slot and a courier hut by surrounding a set of chain boots with planks and the build tool in the top slot.
On it!
Not right now. I will come back to you later!
Yes! Got them right here!!

That was fast! Next place the buildings with the help of the build tool, click build and supply your builder with the materials. I advise you to place the warehouse somewhat centrally in your colony for easy access. The courier hut location is inconsequential on the other hand.
Noted!

Neat! The food your farmer produces will now automatically reach the restaurant through the warehouse. Here, have a set of tools you can drop off in the warehouse to be delivered to your citizens on demand.
Thank you. Bye!
minecolonies.quests.tutorial.welcome.obj: Hello there! I just arrived here and wondered if you wish any guidance setting up the colony?
Yes please!

So let's start by picking a style for your colony first! You can pick a unique style for your colony by going to your Town Hall and right clicking the block. This is the main page. Now, on the right hand side, click the button next to 'Colony Pack' to select your colony style.
Alright! Let me get to it!
I already picked a style!

Okay great. Next, I suggest you to browse the Build Tool to find different buildings you can build. With the Build Tool in your hand, right click on the ground, try to locate the Builder's Hut, then come back to me!
Okay, let me do that!
Okay, I'll do that again!
Yes, but not now. I will come back to you later!
I'm a Colony Master! You underestimate my power!
Hi! Did you choose a colony style already?
No, I forgot what I had to do!

No Problem! You can pick a unique style for your colony by going to your Town Hall and right clicking the block. This is the main page. Now, on the right hand side, click the button next to 'Colony Pack' to select your colony style.
Thanks! Let me check again!
Yes, all done, what is next?
Okay great. Next, I suggest you browse the Build Tool a little bit. With the Build Tool in your hand, right click on the ground, try to locate the Builder's Hut, then come back to me!
Okay, let me do that!
Okay, I'll do that again!
Not yet, I will get to it later!
Welcome back! Were you able to navigate the Build Tool?
Yes; mission accomplished!

Awesome! Then, before placing it, we first have to craft a Builder's Hut hut block. Just surround a door with planks in the crafting table and put the Build Tool in the middle top slot. Come back to me after you have crafted the hut block!
Alright! Let me get to it!
No, what did I have to do again?
Skill is the child of patience. Browse the Build Tool a little bit. With the Build Tool in your hand, right click on the ground, try to locate the Builder's Hut, then come back to me!
Sure! I'll try!
Not yet, but I will come back to you later!
Welcome back! Did you craft the hut block already?
No, I forgot the recipe!
A great leap forward often requires taking two steps back! Just surround a door with planks in the crafting table and put the Build Tool in the top slot.
Alright! Let me get to it!
Yes, all done. What's next?

Perfect! The next step is placing it with the help of the Build Tool. Right click the Build Tool on the ground. Navigate to the Builder's Hut (typically in the fundamentals category) and click on Builder's Hut. Then, you can select a level to preview and in some cases also different alternatives. Use the arrow buttons to adjust the position, rotation, and mirroring. Finally, click the checkmark to place it.
Alrighty then! Let me check this out!
Già fatto!
Not yet, I will get to it later!

Perfetto! L'edificio è piazzato, e un lavoratore inizierà a lavorarvi presto. Prendi questo registro delle missioni e premi maiusc+clic-destro su qualsiasi dei blocchi della capanna nella colonia per rimanere aggiornato con i prossimi passaggi!
Perfetto! Grazie!
minecolonies.scroll.failed1: L'instabile magia della pergamena ti si è rivolta contro!
minecolonies.scroll.failed10: Non credi sia meglio usare delle scale?
minecolonies.scroll.failed3: Questa pergamena necessita di una revisione al tavolo di scrittura!
minecolonies.scroll.failed4: Questa pergamena non sembra essere stata creata dal miglior mago là fuori!
minecolonies.scroll.failed6: Sembra ci sia un errore di scrittura in uno degli antichi glifi!
minecolonies.scroll.failed7: Il mio creatore ha nuovamente sbagliato l'incantesimo?!
minecolonies.scroll.needcolony: Si prega di registrare prima questa pergamena in una colonia facendo shift + clic con il pulsante destro del mouse su un edificio della colonia.
minecolonies.scroll.noguardbuilding: Registra prima questa pergamena in una Torre di Guardia o in una Caserma facendo clic con il tasto destro sul blocco della capanna.
minecolonies.scroll.nopermission: Non hai permessi richiesti per questa colonia.
minecolonies.scroll.wrongdim: Questa pergamena può essere utilizzata solo nella stessa dimensione della colonia.
minecolonies:alchemist.job.desc: Prepara pozioni, pianta verruca del Nether e raccoglie i vischi
minecolonies:alchemist.skills.desc: Influenza la probabilità di miglioramento della ricetta e la velocità di lavoro.
minecolonies:archertraining.job.desc: Apprendista arciere. Pratica il combattimento a distanza.
minecolonies:baker.job.desc: Gestisce tutte le ricette a base di grano. Conosce alcune ricette speciali del pane.
minecolonies:baker.skills.desc: Influenza la probabilità di miglioramento della ricetta e la velocità di fabbricazione.
minecolonies:beekeeper.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità di lavoro e le probabilità di ritorsione dell'ape.
minecolonies:blacksmith.job.desc: Fornisce la colonia della maggior parte di attrezzi, armature e armi.
minecolonies:blacksmith.skills.desc: Influenza la probabilità di miglioramento della ricetta e la velocità di lavoro.
minecolonies:builder.skills.desc: Influisce sulla velocità di posizionamento e di rottura.
minecolonies:chickenherder.job.desc: Raccoglie uova, piume e altri prodotti di pollo.
minecolonies:chickenherder.skills.desc: Influenza la possibilità che raccolgano con successo dei sottoprodotti di pollo e la possibilità di mettere a segno un colpo su un pollo.
minecolonies:combattraining.job.desc: Apprendista cavaliere. Pratica il combattimento corpo a corpo.
minecolonies:composter.job.desc: Composta molti dei prodotti di scarto della colonia
minecolonies:concretemixer.job.desc: Crea polvere di terracotta e terracotta.
minecolonies:concretemixer.skills.desc: Influenza la raccolta del la velocità di fabbricazione del calcestruzzo.
minecolonies:cook.job.desc: Gestisce la maggior parte della cucina e distribuisce il cibo ai cittadini.
minecolonies:cookassistant.job.desc: Gestisce ricette a base di cibo che il cuoco principale non è in grado di gestire.
minecolonies:cookassistant.skills.desc: Influenza la probabilità di miglioramento della ricetta e la velocità di lavoro.
minecolonies:cowboy.job.desc: Munge e alleva mucche per ottenere latte, pelle e manzo crudo.
minecolonies:cowboy.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità di lavoro e il danno che infliggono.
minecolonies:crusher.job.desc: Schiaccia i ciottoli di pietra in ghiaia, ghiaia in sabbia, e sabbia in argilla.
minecolonies:crusher.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità di lavoro e la possibilità di ammalarsi.
minecolonies:deliveryman.job.desc: Consegna gli oggetti e i blocchi richiesti ai giocatori e ai cittadini.
minecolonies:deliveryman.skills.desc: Influisce sulla velocità di camminamento e sulla capacità di evasione dalle missioni simultanee.
minecolonies:druid.job.desc: Unità di supporto. Potenzia gli alleati e depotenzia i nemici.
minecolonies:druid.skills.desc: Influenza la precisione e la qualità della pozione.
minecolonies:dyer.job.desc: Gestisce la maggiore parte della colorazione che è richiesta nella colonia.
minecolonies:dyer.skills.desc: Influenza la probabilità di miglioramento della ricetta e la velocità di lavoro.
minecolonies:enchanter.job.desc: Raccoglie mana osservando altri. Incanta gli oggetti dei cittadini e crea libri incantati.
minecolonies:enchanter.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità di lavoro e la possibilità di ottenere buoni incantesimi.
minecolonies:farmer.job.desc: Coltiva una grande varietà di raccolti fino a 5 campi.
minecolonies:farmer.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità con cui il contadino lavora.
minecolonies:fisherman.job.desc: Spende la maggior parte del tempo a pescare in uno stagno, fiume o lago.
minecolonies:fisherman.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità d pesca e il bottino.
minecolonies:fletcher.job.desc: Maneggia le ricette di pelle, stringhe e lana.
minecolonies:fletcher.skills.desc: Influenza la probabilità di miglioramento della ricetta e la velocità di lavoro.
minecolonies:florist.job.desc: Pianta una grande varietà di fiori per la colonia.
minecolonies:florist.skills.desc: Influenza la possibilità di raccogliere fiori con successo e il tempo di crescita.
minecolonies:glassblower.job.desc: Fornisce la maggior parte degli oggetti in vetro.
minecolonies:glassblower.skills.desc: Influenza le probabilità di miglioramento della ricetta, la velocità di fabbricazione e la velocità di fusione.
minecolonies:healer.job.desc: Cura entità ferite e fornisce cure per le malattie.
minecolonies:healer.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità di lavoro e le probabilità di guarigione miracolosa.
minecolonies:knight.job.desc: Close-quarter fighter. High resilience, low damage output.
minecolonies:knight.skills.desc: Influenza salute, resilienza, e velocità d'attacco.
minecolonies:lumberjack.job.desc: Abbatte alberi e li ripianta in base alle specifiche configurate.
minecolonies:lumberjack.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità di abbattimento e di camminata.
minecolonies:mechanic.job.desc: Maneggia le ricette di pietra rossa e le cose che gli altri lavoratori non possono gestire.
minecolonies:mechanic.skills.desc: Influenza la probabilità di miglioramento della ricetta e la velocità di lavoro.
minecolonies:miner.job.desc: Mina un sistema di condotti sotto la colonia, raccogliendo blocchi e minerali. Può essere un lavoro pericoloso.
minecolonies:miner.skills.desc: Influisce sulla velocità di posizionamento e di rottura.
minecolonies:netherworker.job.desc: Vaga nel Nether per raccogliere un'ampia gamma di materiali. Un lavoro molto pericoloso!.
minecolonies:netherworker.skills.desc: Influenza le probabilità di sopravvivenza e il bottino.
minecolonies:planter.job.desc: Fornisce la canna da zucchero, i cactus e il bambù alla colonia.
minecolonies:planter.skills.desc: Influenza la probabilità di miglioramento della ricetta, il lavoro, e la velocità di fabbricazione.
minecolonies:pupil.job.desc: Si siede e impara dai materiali dati dall'insegnante.
minecolonies:quarrier.job.desc: Richiede un edifico di cava per minare un buco grande. Lavoro sicuro, ma restituisce principalmente risorse comuni.
minecolonies:quarrier.skills.desc: Influisce sulla velocità di posizionamento e di rottura.
minecolonies:rabbitherder.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità di lavoro e la probabilità di colpire un coniglio.
minecolonies:ranger.job.desc: Combattente a distanza, infligge danni elevati, ma ha scarse possibilità di sopravvivenza nel combattimento ravvicinato.
minecolonies:ranger.skills.desc: Influenza velocità, precisione, gittata e danno in uscita.
minecolonies:researcher.job.desc: Ricerca gli argomenti scelti dal giocatore.
minecolonies:researcher.skills.desc: Influenza il tempo offline che i ricercatori possono sfruttare.
minecolonies:sawmill.job.desc: Fornisce la colonia della maggior parte degli oggetti in legno.
minecolonies:sawmill.skills.desc: Influenza la probabilità di miglioramento della ricetta e la velocità di lavoro.
minecolonies:shepherd.job.desc: Tosa le pecore e controlla le dimensioni del gregge.
minecolonies:shepherd.skills.desc: Influenza l'ammontare di lana che ottengono e il danno che infliggono.
minecolonies:sifter.job.desc: Setaccia vari materiali per trovare beni preziosi.
minecolonies:sifter.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità di lavoro e la possibilità di ottenere oggetti.
minecolonies:smelter.job.desc: Rompe i blocchi di minerali in minerali grezzi e li fonde in lingotti.
minecolonies:smelter.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità di cottura/lavoro e le probabilità di moltiplicazione dei minerali.
minecolonies:stonemason.job.desc: Gestisce la maggior parte delle ricette a base di pietra.
minecolonies:stonemason.skills.desc: Influenza la probabilità di miglioramento della ricetta e la velocità di lavoro.
minecolonies:stonesmeltery.job.desc: Fornisce varianti della pietra che richiedono fusione e carbonella
minecolonies:stonesmeltery.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità di lavoro e la velocità di fusione.
minecolonies:student.job.desc: Legge libri per aumentare la propria intelligenza. L'elevata intelligenza consente di apprendere altre abilità più velocemente.
minecolonies:swineherder.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità di lavoro e il danno che infliggono.
minecolonies:teacher.job.desc: Si siede con i bambini e fornisce materiale.
minecolonies:teacher.skills.desc: Influisce la velocità con cui gli allievi imparano.
minecolonies:undertaker.job.desc: Scava tombe per i cittadini e i loro oggetti, con una possibilità di resuscitarli.
minecolonies:undertaker.skills.desc: Influenza la velocità di lavoro e le probabilità di resurrezione.
tile.blockhut.alreadyclaimed: You cannot assign a work order which is already claimed somewhere.
tile.blockhut.cannotbuild: You cannot assign a work order to a builder who cannot build it.
tile.blockhut.messagenopermission: Non hai i permessi necessari per accedere alle strutture in %s.
